description.narrative: We aim to increase Finnish consumers awareness of the environmental impacts of food production and consumption through WWF Finlands communication channels. In addition, we provide meaningful ways of contributing by providing easy everyday solutions to redu ce our ecological footprint by our food choices. At the same time, we continue our work with companies in Finland to ensure that their products are addressing global deforestation by using sustainability certificates. Our aim is to make the more sustainabl e products more widely available for the consumers and replacing the deforestation-risky options. The work is closely connected to WWFs global food practice. WWF targets companies that are most relevant in managing the environmental impacts of food product ion.##We prepare environmental education materials for primary schools, train teachers and support the schools environmental clubs. WWF ambassadors visit schools providing information about global environmental issues and work of WWF, WWF Education officer has provided materials and capacitated the ambassadors. Active youth team of WWF Finland is spreading environmental awareness in Finland.##Cooperation partners: Companies, enterprises and schools.
